diff_act: 8.display the caller's identity on the controller
9.display a possible reason for the failure if available

regen.absent_element: specification for handling call disconnection or termination
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver when a call is disconnected or terminated, and disconnect the call from the loudspeaker.
The system shall automatically disconnect the call when the driver ends the communication or when a pre-defined timeout period has expired.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling multiple call attempts or retry mechanism
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically retry to establish a call to the destination if the initial attempt fails, with a maximum of three attempts before providing an audible and visual indication of failure to the driver.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call was not received by the controller.
